Posts.Content: I also finished chemo in May, and my hair is now about an inch long. It was very curly - too short to tell if my curls will return. I take periodic pictures to keep track of the progress, and it is definitely progressing. Getting married on New Year's Eve so I hope it hurries up!
Posts.Title: hair regrowth after chemo
